review: I had been to hospital and it was for normal heart checkup. ********* *** ** ** *** ******* I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. There was more waiting time in the hospital. It was one hour. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. Tests like echo was done.

Me and my husband had visited the hospital and it was post covid review. ****** *** **** ** ********** **** I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. There was no waiting time in the hospital. Tablets was told to continue. Nutritious diet was suggested to follow and doctor was friendly.

the consultation was for my father he faced with an heart attack so the doctor suggested us to do an angiogram he gave **** treatment & required medicines the hospitality is really good of the doctor & the doctor I would like to recommend the doctor to others in future

My dad had consulted the doctor and it was for giddiness issues. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I would like to recommend the doctor to other people. We had follow-up and medicines was prescribed. ECG was done. Diet was suggested.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very nice Dr. Positive attitude. Love to approach any problems. Full marks to him. Friendly doctor
